articles.title: No, radio DJ Yasminne Cheng isn't giving $6000 to a man who can 'make her house happy' on the bed - AsiaOne
articles.description: It's not new that photos of local celebrities have been used illegally in catfishing ads and social media impersonation accounts. While a lot of them appear to involve financial scams, poor Yasminne Cheng found herself embroiled in something risque. On April …

articles.author: Daniel Dubrovsky
articles.title: Gold and Crude Oil Prices May Fall into the Weekend, Eyes on US PPI after Chinese Beat - DailyFX
articles.description: Gold and crude oil prices may fall into the weekend if a higher-than-expected US PPI report follows similaroutcomes from China. Markets saw cautious risk aversion during Asia trade.

articles.author: Kerry Burke, JOHN ANNESE
articles.title: NYC anti-Asian attack suspect mentally ill, say siblings - New York Daily News
articles.description: Joseph Russo, 28, is accused of pinning an Asian woman to a storefront and yanking her hair on March 22, and of shoving an elderly Asian Man to the ground as he shopped for groceries Monday. The suspect's brother and sister insisted he’s not a bigot, and said…

articles.author: Genevieve Sarah Loh
articles.title: Singapore's Chin Han on becoming Mortal Kombat's Shang Tsung - CNA
articles.description: Singapore’s only Hollywood blockbuster star talks to CNA Lifestyle about saying yes to an iconic role and being part of an authentically diverse Asian cast.
